::Koj::
Koj enters the Ark sets down some this gold colored metal and what looks 
like diamonds. Koj looks at the Rangs "Damn there is no balance Dark Plasma 
will make it off balanced." Koj uses his Tenko Stream on the other Rang. 
"Damn I'm not strong enough to to balance it out."

::Key::
"Liono's can the Matrix Blaster is light attack and can balance it out but 
how to get him to use it." Key starts thinking comes up with a plan.

::2 hours later

::Liono::
Liono exits the Cr feeling a little strange like he learned something new.

::Koj::
"Liono that attack from your chest what was that?"

::Liono::
"The Matrix Blaster what about it?"

::Koj::
"I don't think you can aim it very well? Beside I doubt you can control I 
bet you can't even hit this target holds the rang."

::Liono::
"Your joking"Liono exits into space getting alittle steamed that Koj doubted 
his mastery "Throw it." Liono starts focusing
on his target.

::Koj::
Koj throws the Rang it goes out a good ways.

::Liono::
Liono chest snaps open and he fires a blue stream hitting the Rang as it 
suchs in the enegry. "Any questions?" Liono's Chest snaps shut as he heads 
back to the Ark.

::Koj::
Koj catches the rang as it looks blue and white. "None at all. Tiamat start 
heating the metal."

::Tiamat::
Tiamat using her fire breath start breath break down the golden metal. "What 
are we making."

::Koj::
"A Sword!" Koj enters the back quarters of the Ark.
